summary: All dragons have been made invisible
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://imgur.com/PouCR4I][img]https://i.imgur.com/PouCR4I.png[/img][/url]

Do you want a more difficult dragon fighting experience. Well now you can have it! The dragons are now invisible, and the only way to reveal them is by inflicting damage. Dragons will still make noise and they will still have a shadow.

Installation:
Extract the file to Skyrim/Data folder



[url=http://imgur.com/PouCR4I][img]https://i.imgur.com/GXEJm2o.png[/img]
[/url]John Cena Dragons:Â http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83630/?
author: theryan4476
